languages.text: "Губернатор выдвинул против нас серьезные обвинения, но — я могу лишь уверить вас в этом и поклясться собственной честью — мы не причастны к тому, в чем обвиняют дом Версериан".

traits.locale_text: "Губернатор выдвинул против нас серьезные обвинения, но — я могу лишь уверить вас в этом и поклясться собственной честью — мы не причастны к тому, в чем обвиняют дом Версериан".
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: "The charges brought by the governor are severe, but — I can only assure you of this and swear on my own honour — we are not guilty of the crimes that House Werserian is being accused of."
languages.original_text: "Губернатор выдвинул против нас серьезные обвинения, но — я могу лишь уверить вас в этом и поклясться собственной честью — мы не причастны к тому, в чем обвиняют дом Версериан".

traits.locale_text: "The charges pressed by the governor against us are severe, but — I can only assure you of this and swear on my own honour — that we are not guilty of the crimes that House Werserian is accused of."
traits.speaker: Clemence

traits.locale_text: "The charges pressed by the governor against us are severe, but — I can only assure you of this and swear on my own honour — that we are not guilty of the crimes that House Werserian is accused of."
traits.speaker: Clemence

traits.locale_text: "The charges pressed by the Governor against us are severe, but—I can only assure you of this and swear on my own honour—we are not guilty of the crimes that House Werserian is being accused of."
traits.speaker: Clemence

traits.locale_text: "The charges pressed by the Governor against us are severe, but—I can only assure you of this and swear on my own honour—we are not guilty of the crimes that House Werserian is being accused of."
traits.speaker: Clemence

traits.locale_text: "The charges brought by the governor are severe, but — I can only assure you of this and swear on my own honour — we are not guilty of the crimes that House Werserian is being accused of."
traits.speaker: Clemence

traits.locale_text: "The charges brought by the governor are severe, but — I can only assure you of this and swear on my own honour — we are not guilty of the crimes that House Werserian is being accused of."
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: 「総督が私たちを起訴した罪状は実に重大です。しかし…私にはそう断言し、己の名誉にかけて誓うことしかできませんが…私たちウェルザリアン家は、無実の罪で訴えられているのです」
languages.original_text: "The charges brought by the governor are severe, but — I can only assure you of this and swear on my own honour — we are not guilty of the crimes that House Werserian is being accused of."

traits.locale_text: 「総督が私たちを起訴した罪状は実に重大です。しかし…私にはそう断言し、己の名誉にかけて誓うことしかできませんが…私たちウェルザリアン家は、無実の罪で訴えられているのです」
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: “总督对提出了严厉的指控，可是——我只能以我本人的名誉向您起誓，韦尔森家族绝对没有犯下总督指控的罪行。”
languages.original_text: "The charges brought by the governor are severe, but — I can only assure you of this and swear on my own honour — we are not guilty of the crimes that House Werserian is being accused of."

traits.locale_text: “总督对韦尔森家族提出了严厉的指控，可是——我只能以我本人的名誉向您起誓，我们绝对没有犯下总督指控的罪行。”
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: « Les charges retenues contre nous par le gouverneur sont graves, mais je jure sur mon honneur que la maison Werserian n'est en aucun cas coupable des crimes dont elle est accusée. »
languages.original_text: "The charges brought by the governor are severe, but — I can only assure you of this and swear on my own honour — we are not guilty of the crimes that House Werserian is being accused of."

traits.locale_text: « Les charges retenues contre nous par le gouverneur sont graves, mais je jure sur mon honneur que la maison Werserian n'est en aucun cas coupable des crimes dont elle est accusée. »
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: «Los cargos de los que nos acusa el gobernador son graves. Lo único que puedo hacer es asegurarle y jurarle por mi propio honor que no somos culpables de los delitos de los que se acusa a la casa Werserian».
languages.original_text: "The charges brought by the governor are severe, but — I can only assure you of this and swear on my own honour — we are not guilty of the crimes that House Werserian is being accused of."

traits.locale_text: «Los cargos de los que nos acusa el gobernador son graves. Lo único que puedo hacer es asegurarle y jurarle por mi propio honor que no somos culpables de los delitos de los que se acusa a la casa Werserian».
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: "Die Anschuldigungen, die der Gouverneur gegen uns vorbringt, wiegen schwer. Aber ich versichere Euch und schwöre bei meiner Ehre, wir haben die Verbrechen nicht begangen, derer Haus Werserian angeklagt ist."
languages.original_text: "The charges brought by the governor are severe, but — I can only assure you of this and swear on my own honour — we are not guilty of the crimes that House Werserian is being accused of."

traits.locale_text: "Die Anschuldigungen, die der Gouverneur gegen uns vorbringt, wiegen schwer. Aber ich versichere Euch und schwöre bei meiner Ehre, wir haben die Verbrechen nicht begangen, derer Haus Werserian angeklagt ist."
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: "Valinin ithamları sahiden ağır. Fakat elimden ancak sizi temin etmek ve onurum üzerine ant içmek geliyor. Werserian Hanesi, bahsi geçen suçların müsebbibi değildir."
languages.original_text: "The charges brought by the governor are severe, but — I can only assure you of this and swear on my own honour — we are not guilty of the crimes that House Werserian is being accused of."

traits.locale_text: "Valinin ithamları sahiden ağır. Fakat elimden ancak sizi temin etmek ve onurum üzerine ant içmek gelir. Werserian Hanesi, bahsi geçen suçların müsebbibi değildir."
traits.speaker: Clemence
